title: 1.20 Numbers II: Out of the Wilderness
itunes:title: Numbers II: Out of the Wilderness
description: While the Israelites are stuck in the wilderness they meet Balam and his talking donkey. They defeat King Og and the Midianites, and will never stop talking about it. Moses' siblings Aaron and Miriam die, and in a vicious plot-twist God tells Moses that he will never cross the Jordan
content:encoded: While the Israelites are stuck in the wilderness they meet Balam and his talking donkey. They defeat King Og and the Midianites, and will never stop talking about it. Moses' siblings Aaron and Miriam die, and in a vicious plot-twist God tells Moses that he will never cross the Jordan
itunes:subtitle: After a vicious plot-twist, the Israelites camp at Mt Nebo, poised to conquer Canaan.
itunes:author: Garry Stevens
